meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Cooper Karim Moore Timothy Mahoney Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3983.

div.div:
Champion's winnings matched to the Families of Freedom Scholarship Fund ($10,000 minimum).
Performances by the L.A. Spirit Chorale.

td.p: Sarah Cooper, an administrative assistant from Whittier, California
Karim Moore, a civil engineer from Laurel, Maryland
Timothy Mahoney, a development officer originally from Detroit, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,000)

tr.td: BIOLOGY
SALAD DAYS
ORIGINAL TITLES
DICTATORS & TYRANTS
REMEMBER THE '60s?
YOU WEREN'T "THERE"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_3', 'clue_J_5_3_stuck', '[Timothy gave the correct response after Alex gave the year, before he finished reading the clue. Alex then finished reading it.]
(Alex: You got ahead of me.)
(Timothy: Yes. What are the [*]?)
(Alex: You\'re right.)
(Timothy: Sorry about that.)
(Alex: That\'s okay.
Is it all right --
do I have your permission now to take us into a commercial break?
Well, I won\'t take us
into a commercial break,
but the L.A. Spirit Chorale
will.
Jingle bells, jingle bells, jingle all the way
Oh what fun it is to ride
in a one-horse open sleigh)

Summer Olympics

Timothy
')

crustaceans

KarimSarah
Triple Stumper
